summary.description: Elucidation of the Draft Genome Sequence of Ideonella azotifigens DSMZ21438 A Novel Aerobic Diazotroph of the Betaproteobacteria Isolated from Grass Rhizosphere Soil. Code for quality control, trimming, assembly, and annotation of Illumina sequencing data from Ideonella azotifigens DSMZ21438. The draft genome sequence for type strain Ideonella azotifigens DSMZ21438, a novel aerobic diazotroph of the Betaproteobacteria isolated from grass rhizosphere soil. Manuscript is currently in process. This is the code and data for this article. ||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'azotifigens DSMZ21438T', 'DSMZ21438', 'azotifigens', 'DSMZ21438T'
summary.name: Ideonella azotifigens DSMZ21438T
